Question regarding Dudes In A Dungeon App
Hello, I have a question about...
Get some dudes and get in a dungeon! Check out this amazing app that helps me keep track of my characters, items, and spells:
Basic sword, most warriors learn the basics using one of these
Very basic weapon, easy to use, though somewhat unwieldy
Oldest weapon, and easiest to wield, though still effective
Very small, easy to conceal, best used in pairs
Quick to make, though difficult to learn, very widespread ranged weapon
More widespread and easier to use than a bow, still very effective
Easily manufactured armor, provides only basic defense, better than nothing
Provides a good amount of protection, while still allowing the wearer a range of mobility
Very heavy armor, provides a lot of protection, but limits mobility
Easy to carry in one hand, provides that little bit extra every adventurer needs
Easy way to carry around your items
Small container to carry and keep your water clean
A box that contains all tools needed to start a fire
A necessity for those who travel in the wilderness
Person sized bag to sleep in. Keeps the bugs out
Simple, but effective, there\'s no better feeling the frying the monsters with this spell
Throw a bolt of ice at the enemy, quite good at slowing them down before they can reach you
One of the most complex spells, but at the same time, one of the strongest
Rudementary spell of only the most basic use, still everyone has to start from the basics
While not able to actually inflict bodily harm, very good at keeping the enemy in place and your drinks cool
Much easier than using a shovel, just look at the ground and the hole will dig itself
Moving from place to place has never been this easy
Hide yourself and your friends in a dense cloud of fog
Ever want a legion of the undead at your disposal, the here, is the spell for you
There are all manners of curses in the world, just be careful, the words can be a bit nasty
For the more sinister out there, feel free to steal the life of the enemy
Who cares about all that heavy armor the warriors have to wear, just conjure up some of your own
Your friends gotten beat up, they\'ll be glad you were here after you cast this
Why fight they enemy when you can just turn them to your side?
Make things easier for you and your friends but sowing a bit of confusion
Opposite of heal, causes a fair bit of damage to an enemy
If a friend has died, don\'t worry, just bring them back
For those times when you\'re in real trouble, try calling on an act of god
For all those times that you or your friends get cursed, just clear them of it
Give your friends a bit of a blessing for their times in need
Let loose a cry that will both spook the enemy and give yourself the courage to continue
Put all your strength into this one swing, be careful though, results may tire
Swing with such force that it will hit two enemies at once
Step in the way of an attack for one of your nearby friends, they\'ll appreciate it
Let loose some fowl words to distract the enemy, or bring them to you
Smash an enemy with such force that enemies nearby will feel it
What\'s more fun than sending yourself at full force into the enemy, the squishy noises are a bonus
Turn yourself invisible, makes things even easier to sneak around and cut throats
Stab the enemy while they can\'t see you, proven more effective than while they can
Nobody really needs the stuff that isn\'t bolted down anyways, take it for your own
Slinking through the shadows has never been easier than just teleporting between them
There are all manners of deadly poisons in the world, why not put a little on your weapons
Spin in place with your weapons drawn, easy right?
They wouldn\'t hit a dead guy right? Just fake it and see
Deal damage to all friendly and enemy characters in an area. Those in the center take 6, those caught in the plast take 4
Deal damage to a single character and reduce their speed and agility by 3
Deal 5 damage to an character. Repeat for three nearby characters
Reduce the speed of all nearby enemies by 3
Move all earth in an area to another area over a course of time
Instantly teleport to a nearby place you can see
Create a dense cloud of fog in an area nearby, blocks line of sight through it and obscures those within it
Raise a skeleton or zombie from a nearby corpse under your command

Choose a curse to inflict:
 1. Curse of years: reduce the targets strength, agility and resilience by 3
 2. Curse of blindess: blind the enemy, reducing their attack skills by 5
 3. Curse of illness: Decrease the targets strength and resilience by 4 and their Fighting skill by 3
Take control of a nearby group of plants. Plants controlled this way can be used to attack or entangle the enemy
Deal 3 damage to target and heal for 2
Conjure a magic suit of armor that increases your defense by 4
Temporarily take control of target enemy
Reduce nearby enemies intelligence and agility by 3
Deal 3 damage to target and reduce their strength and agility by 2
Bring a dead character back to life at half health

Call upon your god to bring about one of the following miracle:
 1. Heal all nearby allies for 4
 2. Deal 3 damage to all nearby enemies
 3. Remove all curses on all nearby allies
Remove a single curse from a nearby ally

Bless an ally, giving them one of the following effects:
 1. Increase one attribute of an ally by 3
 2. Give an ally +3 to their next attack
 3. Increase the defense of a nearby ally by 2
Increase your fighting skill by 3 and your strength by 3 for a duration. Reduce the fighting skill of nearby enemies by 2
Attack with a weapon and deal it\'s damage by 4. Afterwards, reduce your strength by 3 for a duration
Attack with a weapon against 2 nearby enemies, dealing it\'s damage +2
Use only when a nearby ally is attacked, you suffer the attack instead
Nearby enemies must either attack you or suffer -2 to their fighting skill for a duration
Attack with a weapon and deal it\'s damage +3 to a single enemy. Deal half that much to all adjacent enemies
Only use if not in melee. Charge at full force at an enemy and make an attack with a weapon increasing your fighting skill by 4 for this attack and deal it\'s damage +3
Turn yourself invisible, making it impossible for the enemy to see you for a duration
Use only if the enemy can\'t see you. Make an attack with a weapon and deal it\'s damage +5. Doing this immediately reveals you
Instantly steal an object of your choice not currently being held by anyone that is within range
Use only if the enemy can\'t see you. Instantly teleport to another nearby location you can see where the enemy can\'t see you

Coat a weapon in poison, choosing one of the following effects, lasts until after your next attack:
 1. Bloodblossom Poison: Your next attack deals +2 damage and reduces the targets strength and agility by 2 for the duration
 2. Kingsrose Poison: Your next attack deals +1 damage and causes the enemy to suffer 1 damage at the start of their turn for the duration
 3. Thistleweed Poison: your next attack deals +3 damage and prevents the target from casting spells for the duration
Draw all weapons and spin in place, dealing 4 damage all adjacent enemies
Use only if you were hit by an enemy. Fall to the ground and pretend to be dead enemies must successfully notice that you are pretending to be able to attack you
